title: LFT Bronze to Silver
body:
Looking for a team, willing to play anywhere.. although jungle is not my best. I have a large champ pool but Thresh or Morgana are the main champions I win on.

Currently I'm bronze 3 but I'm on the way up.

replies.body:
If u want to we can i play mainly mid/adc/top but want to play norms first to see if  ur actually good if u know what im trying to say so add me Venemy
